About

Born and raised in Tallahassee, I spent close to a decade in St. Louis, MO (2012-2020). I bought a house through short-sale auction in the city, and performed a full gut-rehab on it while I was working full-time, and attending college. I lived in St. Louis until early 2020, at which point I sold my then finished house and moved back to Florida to focus on my education full-time. My formal education in Computer Science prior to completing my B.S. degree was limited to taking web design, JavaScript, C++, and a few general I.T. related courses in high school. I have several years of experience with web-development, as that was one of the jobs I held long term in St. Louis,MO.

Education:

  • Saint Louis Community College (STLCC) - Forest Park : General courses

  • Saint Louis University (SLU): Dual Major - B.S. in Biochemistry, B.A. in Russian Studies (Language, History, & Culture)

  • Southern New Hampshire University (SNHU): Major - Computer Science B.S. - GPA: 4.0 - Graduated summa cum laude.
      Accomplishments:
    • Built full-stack Android mobile application using Kotlin & Jetpack Compose. Application is for managing a warehouse's product inventory.
    • Built full-stack console/terminal based Rust application for financial investment firm to manage their client lists & associated client data. Utilizes a remote MySQL database for storing client data used in general application, as well as hashed employee passwords for authenticating login attempts.
    • Built full, playable, prototype level for a stealth based 3rd person game using Unreal Engine 5.4. Implemented various mechanics such as player being caught, player hiding/visibility, patrolling NPC enemies, various collision related mechanics such as trip wires, security cameras, environmental meshes, etc. Also designed the various custom environment models that were used to create the map for the level. Implemented various item pickups that affect the player's score, visible on the player HUD. Keys and the doors they unlock were also implemented. Included level objectives on the hud which update when progress event is triggered. Everything implemented from scratch.
    • Built JavaScript based web-application using Express, Node.js, Handlebars(page templating), and MongoDB. Also constructed a SPA for managing & customizing the web-app using Angular.
    • Constructed a machine learning model in Python using Keras/TensorFlow. Utilized deep Q-learning to develop the most efficient strategy for completing an exploration based puzzle game.

Employment:

  • FedEX Office - Lead Production Coordinator (Production Manager) - 2010-2012:
    • Managed daily operations of the production floor, production of orders when necessary, and intake / processing of new orders for Tier-1 center (1M+ annual gross).
    • Coordinated with remote departments to ensure projects were delegated to appropriate vendors to meet set deadlines.
    • Responsible for communicating order details between shifts (hand-offs), ensuring all orders met quality guidelines, and processing center end of day paperwork/bank deposits.

  • UPS - Dispatch Supervisor - 2013-2016:
    • Built daily route & load plan for 30+ trucks/drivers (Greater Metro area)
    • Handled & corrected address entries for the address database used in route planning
    • Daily communication with upper-level center supervisors to handle internal paperwork & filings related to position

  • TimeKeeper - Web Developer & e-Commerce Store Manager - 2013-2019:
    • Designed and built e-commerce webstore platform for brick and mortar business.
    • Custom site built using JavaScript, CSS, and tools provided by Prestashop (PHP).
    • Integrated e-commerce web-store to allow syncing of inventory from other online platforms (using Ebay's sync API).
    • Managed inventory, generated web-store pages for 1000's of high-value items (Jewelry, Clocks, Antiques, & Classic Cars)
    • Diverted traffic from our sales accounts on other e-commerce platforms (Etsy/Ebay) to the web-store.Increased revenue on individual high-value sales by using SEO techniques, Advertising, and removing cuts taken from external platforms.

    • Technologies:

    • Core / Languages

      • C :

        A powerful low-level programming language with high performance and direct hardware access.

      • x86 Assembly :

        Low-level programming language for x86 architecture processors.

      • C++ :

        Learn this versatile and powerful programming language.

      • Rust :

        A language empowering everyone to build reliable and efficient software.

      • Kotlin :

        Concise. Multiplatform. Fun.

      • Java :

        Free-to-use, and a versatile language designed for ease of use.

      • JavaScript :

        A high-level, often just-in-time compiled language that conforms to the ECMAScript standard

      • Python :

        Python lets you work quickly, and integrate systems more effectively.

    • Java Enterprise & Spring Ecosystem

      • Spring Framework :

        The foundation for all Spring projects, providing comprehensive infrastructure support for Java applications.

      • Spring Boot :

        Makes it easy to create stand-alone, production-grade Spring based Applications that you can "just run".

      • Spring Data JPA :

        Part of the Spring Data family, making it easy to implement JPA based repositories and simplify your persistence layer.

      • Hibernate :

        A powerful, high-performance Object/Relational persistence and query service for Java.

      • Spring REST :

        Build RESTful web services with Spring MVC and Spring WebFlux.

      • Spring Security :

        Highly customizable authentication and access-control framework for Spring applications.

    • Web-based

      • React :

        A JavaScript library for building user interfaces with a component-based architecture.

      • ExpressJS :

        Fast, unopinionated, minimalist web framework for Node.js

      • Node.js :

        JavaScript runtime environment that lets developers create servers, web apps, command line tools and scripts

      • Angular :

        A web framework that empowers developers to build fast, reliable applications.

      • Astro :

        Build fast websites, faster.

    • Database

      • MySQL :

        The world's most popular open source database

      • MongoDB :

        Built by developers, for developers

    • Operating Platforms & Containers

      • GCC :

        The GNU Compiler Collection - a compiler system supporting various programming languages.

      • Linux/Unix Systems :

        Highly capable in Unix-based environments, with a specializing in Debian-based distributions

      • Android :

        Your Android, smarter and more secure.

      • Docker :

        Develop faster. Run anywhere.
